keyMoments.title: Caribou's Treasure Storage Revealed
keyMoments.description: The treasure Caribou stole is revealed to have been stored inside his body using his Numa Numa no Mi powers. When knocked unconscious, the treasure spills out.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the practical application of Caribou's swamp powers for storage and transportation.

abilities.description: User can store large amounts of objects and treasure inside their swamp body
